page.title: 14CLUBS FOR THE YOUNG.
page.content: {GIRL GUIDES}is an organisation for girls 10 until 15.We interviewed Miss Ferens,Guide Commissioner who explained that about 30 girls meet on a Tuesday night,7.15-9.00.The girls start the evening with challenges; patrol and about 6 girls leave to accomplish set tasks.Other activities include songs,games and preparations for camp. At{SUNDAY SCHOOL,}they try to teach children about God and to do good all the time.The club in Ferriby has been going for as long as anyone can remember.They meet on a Sunday morning from 11 o'clock to 12 o'clock in the Church Hall. In Sunday school they play games and make things and also they have a few lessons.They sometimes go on trips.They do plays to show in Church.There are 56 children in the group and they split into age groups.
